page.title: 13Frizer's Farm Sonning Eye
page.content: Phillimore Farms is one big estate and it is divided into smaller farms. {Frizer's Farm}is a piece of land belonging to Phillimore Farms near Sonning in Oxfordshire. It is a 400 acre farm and is part of the 2000 acre estate. Frizer's Farm is partly a dairy farm with 250 cattle which are {Frisians, the black and white cows. These are the cows that are milked. There are also 100 heifers. Recently a new dairy has been put in and some grain stores are in the process of being built. There is a{Frisian bull which is used to serve the cattle. Artificial insemination is also used. They grow oil seed rape which makes margarine and special oils, wheat and barley, field beans, grass and leys. They have permanent pasture on the flat land near the Thames. The other fields are on the hillsides.
